section.heading: Rules and regulations for implementation of subchapter.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90-day) addition of §§ 31-2451 to 31-2454 1981 Ed., see §§ 2 to 5 of the Attendance and School Safety Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-319, April 17, 2000, 47 DCR 2882).
